What is the mobile library?

Disabled Access; enter details

Are there age restrictions?

No - we welcome visitors of all ages.

How do I join?

If you are already a member of enter council name Library service you need do nothing.

If you are not yet a member you can download an application form here link to pid 438 or collect one on your first visit to the mobile Library.

How much choice is there?

We carry a wide range of materials. If the book you require is not currently on the mobile library you can request it and we will try to get it for you.
